entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
Hello World

The purpose of this blog is to introduce complete beginners to the world of programming. There will be weekly screencasts introducing a new topic in programming. Some people are quickly intimidated by new things, escepcially when it comes to technology. We will be moving at a rather slow pace to make sure that no one is lost along the way. If you feel that the pace is too slow, then you might be more comfortable checking out codeacademy.
